projects.name: Morpheus
projects.description: Your All-in-One Solution. Morpheus brings together real-time monitoring, intuitive dashboards, and unified container orchestration in a single, easy-to-use platform.

projects.name: RBRDUCK - GenAI PR manager
projects.description: RBRDCK is an AI-powered pull request reviewer that leverages a local Large Language Model (LLM) to analyze code changes and provide feedback. The primary goal is to integrate this tool into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines

projects.name: MSFT Autogen Unit Test Gen
projects.description: AI Unit Test Generation using OPEN AI API & MSFT AutoGen Agents intercommunication VIA Node package for parallel execution in multiple tabs

projects.name: Salesforce Commerce Cloud Shop & SDK Explorer
projects.description: E-commerce platform built on Salesforce Commerce Cloud, featuring a custom-built SDK endpoint explorer for testing and documenting SCAPI endpoints. Utilizes SCAPI for backend operations with local browser caching for improved performance and faster page refreshes. The SDK explorer allows developers to interact with and test Commerce Cloud endpoints in real-time.
